en.name: Advising the Customer
en.coverDescription: In this course you can explore how knowing your customers and understanding their needs will help your team serve customers better. You will see how important it is to know your products, their features and their benefits, and why you must match these to customers with an understanding of what is important to them. Finally, you’ll learn that the majority of your decisions affect the people in your team.

fr.name: Conseiller un client en magasin
fr.coverDescription: Dans ce cours, vous découvrirez comment le fait de connaître vos clients et de comprendre leurs besoins aidera votre équipe à mieux les servir. Vous verrez à quel point il est important de connaître vos produits, leurs caractéristiques et leurs avantages, et pourquoi vous devez les faire correspondre aux attentes de vos clients en comprenant ce qui est important pour eux. Enfin, vous apprendrez que la majorité de vos décisions affectent les membres de votre équipe.

de.name: Beratung des Kunden
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
In this course you can explore how knowing your customers and understanding their needs will help your team serve customers better. You will see how important it is to know your products, their features and their benefits, and why you must match these to customers with an understanding of what is important to them. Finally, you’ll learn that the majority of your decisions affect the people in your team.
